alerts.name: High CPU Usage
alerts.description: Alert when average CPU usage exceeds 80% for more than 5 minutes.

alerts.name: High Memory Usage
alerts.description: Alert when average memory usage exceeds 90% for more than 5 minutes.

explanation: These SLIs and SLOs are based on the available CPU and memory usage metrics. The chosen thresholds aim to ensure good service performance while minimizing resource waste.
llm_suggestions: Consider implementing auto-scaling based on CPU and memory usage
Optimize application code to reduce CPU and memory consumption
